summary: Provides a comprehensive set of unit tests for the EMR Serverless client, covering application creation, deletion, retrieval, listing, start/stop/update operations, as well as job run lifecycle actions (start, get, list, cancel) and server response handling using mocked AWS services.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of EMR Serverless integration, ensuring that application and job run functionalities behave as expected under normal and error scenarios, supporting reliable deployment and continuous integration.
